reporter_caption.center: COMMONWEALTH v. WILLIAMS, 43 Mass. App. Ct. 1102 (1997)

caption.center: COMMONWEALTH vs. HAROLD L. WILLIAMS, JR.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment on count B of the indictment is reversed, the finding of guilty is set aside, and judgment shall enter for the defendant on that count. The matter is remanded to the Superior Court for resentencing on the conviction on count A.
